category-def.name: LLVM Toolchain Support
category-def.label: LLVM Toolchain Support
category-def.description:
LLVM plugin for Eclipse CDT provides LLVM toolchain support for Eclipse CDT. It can compile C and C++ program code with Clang or llvm-gcc front-ends using LLVM as a back-end.
LLVM tools such as assembler, archiver, linker, static compiler (llc), JIT/Interpreter (lli) are featured and can be configured via graphical user interface (Project->Properties->C/C++ Build->Settings).
Plugin supports Linux, MacOSX and Windows with MinGW and Cygwin.
